alert.note: Alert for Northwest Pinal County (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 5:43PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Pinal County through 615 PM MST... At 543 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Casa Grande, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs, blow around unsecured objects, and generate blowing dust. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Casa Grande and Olberg. This includes AZ Interstate 10 between mile markers 177 and 189. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
